title: Coaching
body:
Yo I am currently coaching for a small fee or $40usd per hour. I have the mind of a challenger and the mechanics of a challenger lcs all star player.

Current rank: silver 4 ( due to riot matchmaking system, resulting in me getting feeders/trolls/afks/downies/autistic12vies )

Add me in game if you're interested - IGN: pu55y d3stroy3r

replies.body: I'd be willing to bet you've never seen a pu55y, let alone destroyed one.
Don't worry. With my mechanics and game mindset I am sure I can coach you out of bronze :D
Nobody coaches me out of bronze you virgin.
Add me in game and we can start sessions when we are both free :D
Add me in game and we can discuss a time when we are both available :D
With That Bronze Icon too..... Not a chance {{summoner:4}}
not gonna pay 40 bucks an hour, mate
